# secondaryAttributedText

**Instance Property**

An attributed variant of the secondary text.

## Declaration

```swift
var secondaryAttributedText: NSAttributedString? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This value supersedes the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIListContentConfiguration-c.class/secondaryText] property.

## Customizing content

- **image**: The image to display.
- **text**: The primary text.
- **attributedText**: An attributed variant of the primary text.
- **secondaryText**: The secondary text.
